description: Shows a list of all role users within the current user account.
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: Filter result by a specific role user ID
Only show role users of a specific subuser
Index of the first entry to be returned
Max. number of entries to be returned. The system has a default value for performance purposes
Parameter by which the output will be sorted. Can be either ROLEID to sort by the role user ID in ascending order or ROLEIDDESC to sort by the role user ID in descending order. Default is ROLEID
Depth of subuser accounts to check; can be SELF, ALL or SUBUSER
